creator: ericzbeard@hotmail.com
text:
I have a set of fairly simple nested tags that are generating a VerifyError 
when I try to use them in a jsp.  The problem does not happen with the same 
setup on a linux box, only with Solaris 8 and jdk 1.3 or 1.4

Here's the error: (the only difference between this one and the jdk 1.3 error 
is the Class.x methods)

javax.servlet.ServletException: (class: org/apache/jsp/products$jsp, method: 
_jspService signature: 
(Ljavax/servlet/http/HttpServletRequest;Ljavax/servlet/http/HttpServletResponse;
)V) Incompatible object argument for function call
	at org.apache.jasper.servlet.JspServlet.service(JspServlet.java:484)
	at javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet.service(HttpServlet.java:853)
	at org.apache.catalina.core.ApplicationFilterChain.internalDoFilter
(ApplicationFilterChain.java:247)
	at org.apache.catalina.core.ApplicationFilterChain.doFilter
(ApplicationFilterChain.java:193)
	at org.apache.catalina.core.StandardWrapperValve.invoke
(StandardWrapperValve.java:243)

(StandardPipeline.java:566)
	at org.apache.catalina.core.StandardPipeline.invoke
(StandardPipeline.java:472)

referenced in the jsp
